name: Explorer's Pack
description: A complete adventure kit containing essential supplies for exploration and survival in the wilderness. Unpacking equips a backpack and places all contents inside it.
notes: Contains: Backpack, Bedroll, Rations (10 days), Rope (50 feet), Tinderbox, Torch (10), Waterskin, Mess kit, Common Clothes
Must not be wearing a backpack to unpack
Unpacking equips backpack and places contents inside
Single use item - consumed when unpacked
